title: Calories in a Cupcake
meta_description: Discover calories in cupcake, including macros like carbs, protein, and fat, plus per-unit nutrition and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard vanilla cupcake with buttercream frosting; ~50 g unfrosted cake + 20 g frosting; baked, no fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, frosting type, brand, and ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard frosted cupcake has ~250 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cupcake?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard frosted vanilla cupcake.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cupcake?
faqs.a: Roughly 35 g carbs, including 25 g sugars, per cupcake.
Yes, ~12 g total fat per cupcake, with 4 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does frosting affect calories in cupcake?
faqs.a: Frosting adds ~100 kcal; unfrosted is lower at ~150 kcal.
Use fruit purees, reduce sugar, or opt for mini sizes to cut calories by 50% or more.
